articles.title: Will This TikTok Cereal Box Hack Solve All Your Breakfast Problems?

articles.author: Karissa Bell
articles.title: Trump admin will reportedly force ByteDance to sell TikTok
articles.description: It looks like Donald Trump is about to make good on his promise to go after TikTok. The Trump administration will soon force ByteDance, the Chinese company that owns TikTok, to sell the app to a U.S. owner, Bloomberg reports.And there’s already one tech giant…

articles.title: TikTok CEO says the app has ‘become the target’ but is ‘not the enemy
articles.description: It’s fair to say that TikTok is facing battles on several fronts, with the White House and Facebook both parking tanks on its lawn. The US is reportedly preparing to ban the Chinese-owned company as part of its broader crackdown on Chinese technology. And Fac…
